metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6660 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Form API in Drupal 6.x before 6.37 and 7.x before 7.39 does notproperly validate the form token, which allows remote attackers to conductCSRF attacks that upload files in a different user's account via vectorsrelated to "file upload value callbacks."

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
